author: PlayStation
description:
Climate Station is your portal into the living history of our planet and the futures we still have time to shape.

Designed for PS5 and #PSVR2, this free, immersive experience puts you in the middle of Earth’s most critical story: our own.

Over 90 minutes of interactive content takes you through shifting temperatures and stark climate futures, all built with real-world data by NASA, NOAA, Berkeley Earth, the IPCC, and more.
title: Climate Station is a free, immersive experience about our changing planet for #PS5 and #PSVR2 🌍
